verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: woke] up [ARGM-TMP: an hour earlier] [ARGM-TMP: for a year] and i 'm convinced it ruined my productivity on some days my work routine ran like a blurred film in front of me i felt like i had jet lag but i felt that every day i was in permanent jet lag kenneth p wright roenneberger till roennberger paul x kelley lmu munich university of colorado boulder melatonin michael breus university of arizona
